Location.longDescription: The location of a resource. For more information see RFC4514.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Address1.longDescription: Free form 1st address line for the location.

Address2.longDescription: Free form 2nd address line for the location.

Address3.longDescription: Free form 3rd address line for the location.

Building.longDescription: Name of the building in which the part is installed.

City.longDescription: Name of the town or city in which the part is installed.

Country.longDescription: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 ASCII country code or ISO 3166-1 numeric country code of the country in which the part is installed.

GPSCoords.description: The GPS coordinates of the part.
GPSCoords.longDescription: The GPS coordinates of the part. If furnished, this shall be expressed in the format '[-][nn]n.nnnnnn, [-][nn]n.nnnnn', i.e. two numbers, either positive or negative, with six decimal places of precision, comma-separated.

Item.longDescription: Item position. If Shelf is specified, this should be the slot number within the shelf, otherwise it may have a more global meaning.

OtherLocationInfo.description: Other free form text describing the item's location.
OtherLocationInfo.longDescription: Other free form text describing the item's location.

Rack.longDescription: Rack name or number. If Row is specified, this should be the rack number within the row, otherwise it may have a more global meaning.

Room.description: Name or number of the room.
Room.longDescription: Name or number of the room in which the part is installed.

Row.longDescription: Row name or number in which the part is installed.

Shelf.description: Shelf or unit name or number.
Shelf.longDescription: Shelf or unit name or number. If Rack is specified, this should be the shelf number within the rack, otherwise it may have a more global meaning.

State.longDescription: Name of the state in the country or territory.

Territory.longDescription: Name of the territory in the country. Not all countries use this in addresses. India and China do.

title: #Location.v1_0_0
